Bain and Company India Pvt. Ltd.

COMPANY OVERVIEW
Name of the Company : Bain and Company India Pvt. Ltd.
Website (or any other source of information) : www.bain.com
Industry Sector : Consulting
Brief Write-up on the Company (50-75 words) :
Bain & Company is a global business consulting firm with offices in all major cities. We help management make the big decisions: on strategy, operations, mergers & acquisitions, technology and organization.

Bain was founded in 1973 on the principle that consultants must measure their success in terms of their clients' financial results. Companies that outperform the market like to work with us; we are as passionate about their results as they are.
 
JOB PROFILE
Job Designation : Associate Consultant
Job Description : At Bain, you will work with extraordinary people with a one-team attitude who have a passion to deliver real results and enjoy what they do. We take our work very seriously, but not ourselves. Bains business globally, is robust and growing, up 30% compared to last year and averaging 15% per year for decades our relentless focus on results is a winning approach. The India office has been the fastest growing office in Bain history. In 5 years, we have come in striking distance of competitors who have been present in India for a very long time. 5 year CAGR is ~30%

Bain Associate consultants (ACs) are the heart and soul of our organization. At Bain, you will be our frontline in developing powerful insights as well as driving results for our clients. ACs are generalists who work with case teams and are exposed to a wide variety of industries and capabilities. On each case, ACs find the right information, create and interpret analyses, and present their findings to case teams and clients. Their work becomes the basis of the team's strategic recommendations. As ACs become stronger contributors to their teams, they gain more client contact and broader strategic development responsibilities. More than just "analysts" who analyse and report data, ACs are core to how Bain generates results for clients.

Responsibility and learning

As a Bain AC, you get the chance to make an impact right away. You're the one who finds the critical information, develops high-quality analysis and assesses the most pressing issues our clients face. You also share your insights and recommendations with your team and the client. In short, we expect and need you to make a difference.

Throughout your time as an AC, you'll learn, be stretched, and grow at an incredible pace. In addition to hands-on experience during client engagements, regular, worldwide, formal training programs will teach you the broad skill set you need to succeed as a business leader.

But perhaps the most profound learning experiences come simply from interacting with your colleagues. Bain people represent the best and the brightest of the consulting industry. Working closely alongside your team and benefiting from informal mentoring, you'll quickly fill any gaps in your industry knowledge. You, in turn, will be surprised at how fast you start mentoring others.
Place of Posting : Gurgaon & Mumbai
 
SALARY DETAILS
  • Performance based bonus is not part of Gross/CTC.
  • Any amount to be disbursed later than the end of first 12 months is not part of Gross/CTC.
  • Gross Salary refers to the amount mentioned in the pay-check issued to the employee. It does not include any kind of deductions like Income Tax, Provident Fund Amount etc.

Cost to Company :   INR 14.5 Lacs
Gross :   INR 13 Lacs
Perks / Bonus / Incentives :   INR 1.5 (Performance Bonus)
Bond or Service Contract :   No

Brief Write-up on the Company (50-75 words) :
OperaSolutions specialize in tangible profit enhancement and deliver results by unleashing the power of clients vast reserves of data via proprietary intellectual property and extraordinary intellectual talent.

Founded in 2003, we are now number 700+ professionals with offices in New York, Jersey City, Boston, San Diego, London, Paris, New Delhi, and Shanghai. We serve enterprises in Financial Services, Healthcare, Government, Supply Chain, Marketing, and other sectors. People succeed through talent, drive, and passion, and advance based on performance and contribution to our progress. In keeping with the firms entrepreneurial soul, we encourage our people to take risks and try new pathways.
 
JOB PROFILE
Job Designation : Analytics Specialist
Job Description : Analytics and technology are central to our value proposition. We are looking to hire Analytic Specialists, who will be joining a rapidly growing firm offering exceptional work opportunities with mathematicians, scientists, computer scientists, and software experts - working on very interesting questions and using an array of cutting edge approaches. You will have the breadth and the support to try new and creative avenues to solve problems.

Analysts Specialist typically design, develop, and deploy state-of-the-art, data-driven predictive models to solve business problems using the latest and most appropriate technologies in machine learning, statistical modeling and Operations Research. Main responsibilities include: development of analytic solutions; pattern identification and feature extraction; variable selection; experimentation with algorithms. They possess deep knowledge of analytic methodologies (regression, signal processing, optimization, neural networks, etc.)

COMPANY OVERVIEW
Name of the Company : ESSEX Lake Group, LLC
Website (or any other source of information) : http://www.essexlg.com/
Industry Sector : Consulting
Brief Write-up on the Company (50-75 words) :
Essex Lake Group LLC, is a young, unique and results-oriented professional services firm that focuses on uncovering hidden profit opportunities for clients in four consumer-based industries, including financial services, telecom, health care and travel and leisure services. In response to a marketplace full of competing firms that are involved in only part of the profit enhancement process, Essex's teams are structured to be involved on an iterative basis in upfront strategy, granular and insightful analysis, and their translation into results. Essex now represents a viable alternative to most traditional strategy consultants, statistical modeling shops and IT consulting firms.

With offices in New York, London, Milan, Shanghai, St. Petersburg and New Delhi, Essex has successfully completed engagements in Asia, Europe and the U.S. While ESSEX Lake Group, LLC is a relatively new legal entity, ESSEX Lake's team members have worked together for ten years serving a broad range of clients, including three of the top five global banks, three of the world's largest credit card firms, thirteen regional banks, leading oil & gas producer, top brokerage houses, and leading telecom firm.
 
JOB PROFILE
Job Designation : Business Analyst
Job Description : Business Analysts (BA's) at Essex are the key executioners on any project. They work collaboratively with other team members, associates and managers to deliver key analysis that identifies key insights and profit-enhancement opportunities. The BA's would then coordinate with various Essex teams and the client to implement and execute these ideas, capturing tangible improvement. BA's present their work to mid-level clients and assist in client recommendations on a day-to day basis. BA's also assist in Business Development and take on key firm responsibilities while on client assignments.

BA's tend to work collaboratively with client teams on site and are exposed to direct client interaction and communication. We are a meritocracy; those who demonstrate ability, motivation and passion are offered opportunities commensurate with their contribution. Ideal candidates have excellent analytical, interpersonal and leadership skills.

h Valuing financial instruments including derivatives.
h Implementation of Basel II/Basel III in leading Banks.
h Developing credit scoring models for Retail/Corporate asset classes.

h Designing Treasury products for Banks.

h Sound understanding of financial modeling and econometrics.

COMPANY OVERVIEW
Name of the Company : Texas Instruments
Website (or any other source of information) : www.ti.com
Industry Sector : Core (Technical)
Brief Write-up on the Company (50-75 words) :
In August 1985, TI set up a R&D facility in Bangalore and became the first global technology company to establish its presence in India. Ever since, India has been a great resource for TI for great talent, great leadership and great innovation.The focus at TI India has consistently been on innovation. The number of patents filed in the US by our engineers in India is perhaps the highest from any technology company in the country. Dataquest and the Government of India have recognized TI as the most innovative company in the country.

TI India has achieved many firsts in its impressive track record. In 1995, TI developed the first processor designed in India for control applications. The TI India R&D Center was extensively involved in developing LoCosto, the industrys first single chip solution for wireless handsets.
The National Association for Software & Services Companies (NASSCOM) conferred TI with the NASSCOM Award for IT Innovation for 2007.

TI India is deeply involved in developing state-of-the-art solutions for applications like wireless handsets, wireless infrastructure (base stations), video (security and surveillance, IP phones, set-top boxes), High Performance Analog, etc. Today, there is hardly any chip produced by TI that is not touched by engineers at TI India.Since 2006, in addition to being a significant and critical R&D center for TI globally, TI India has increased its focus on the Indian semiconductor market in a big way. The company is working closely with its customers in India in a wide array of sectors such as industrial electronics (UPS, inverters, energy meters, lighting, etc.), medical electronics (ultrasound scanners, x-ray machines, ECG machines, MRI scanners, etc.), consumer, telecom and automotive. TI India has opened offices in multiple locations in the country to reach out to its customers with sales and applications support.

JOB PROFILE
Job Designation : R&D Engineer
Job Description : Challenges: Increases in the size & complexity of todays RTL designs have intensified challenges of verification. Meeting these challenges requires advanced technologies and methodologies that ensure the highest design quality. The Synopsys suite of Functional Verification tools are tightly integrated, best-in-class technologies that allow designers to find bugs quickly and easily, significantly improving the quality of the most complex designs and enabling first-pass silicon success. These tools include VCS for high-performance simulation, Magel-lan for formal hybrid verification, the VCS Verification Li-brary (Verification IP), Pioneer-NTB with Vera for test-bench automation, Leda for static checking and MVSIM & MVRC for multi-voltage simulation & rule checking.
Responsibility as R&D Engineer
Responsible for designing, implementing and supporting pro-jects related to the Synopsys Verification Platform Products. These projects will involve implementing new tool features, performance optimizations and providing technical solutions to customers issues with the software. The candidate will be utilizing his/her background/skills in Hardware Description Languages (Verilog/VHDL), Digital design, Logic simula-tion, Data Structures, Algorithms and Proficiency in C/C++ to design and develop the most efficient solutions.

JOB PROFILE
Job Designation : Associate Systems Engineer
Job Description : If you are passionate about leading-edge technology, have strong interpersonal skills, thrive on solving problems, and want to collaborate with highly-talented people globally then apply today for an Associate Systems Engineer (ASE) position at Cisco.
The Cisco Sales Associates Program (CSAP) is one of the most highly-coveted early-in-career development programs designed specifically for top university graduates from around the world who aspire to become the next generation of sales leaders at Cisco. CSAP provides world-class, hands-on educational and experiential training that will develop our Associate Systems Engineers (ASEs) to become successful Systems Engineers in the Cisco Sales Organization.
The ASE role enables you to advance your career rapidly by providing the training and resources needed to become successful in an industry-leading sales organization. During the first three months of the program, ASEs will expand their sales and business acumen, increase their technical knowledge and develop executive presentation skills, as well as learn about Ciscos architectures, solutions, products, and competitors. ASEs learn using technical case studies, customer simulations, and a blend of instructor-led and self-paced training delivered via Cisco TelePresence, Cisco WebEx, and iPad technologies.
Throughout the next nine months of the program, in parallel with certification studies and virtual learning, ASEs will move into an engineering role where they will get on-the-job experience interacting with customers and partners and will be mentored by Cisco seasoned engineering professionals. They will be assigned to work in the following organization.
Technology Solutions Network (TSN)
 In TSN, ASEs will support account teams virtually and collaboratively with a variety of SE technical sales activities to give our SEs more customer and partner face time by collaborating on pre-sales activities. They will expand the technical depth and coverage where limited resources currently exist and will increase account team productivity by providing high-quality, timely responses to sales questions and research requests.
After successfully completing the program, ASEs are promoted into a Virtual Systems Engineering (VSE) role within the Cisco sales organization where they can continue to grow in a rewarding career.
A successful ASE will:
 Master the art of communicating complex details in simplistic terms to our customers and partners
 Thrive in a global, fast-paced, and collaborative environment
 Possess a strong attention to detail, able to react creatively but rationally to customer requests
 Become a leader that is able to work under pressure and make decisions with a positive can-do attitude
Associate Systems Engineer Job Description, 20120813 2
 Be open minded and passionate about learning new technologies and delivering the best solution to our customers, on time, and as promised
 Continue to focus on personal development and learning throughout his or her career
Eligibility Requirements:
 Undergraduate or graduate degree (minimum BS/BA)
 Graduated from an accredited university prior to program start date and within 27 months of program start date
 Cumulative GPA of 3.0 or higher or equivalent in your academic program
 Electrical/Computer/Networking Engineering, Information Technology, MIS, Computer Science, Mathematics, or Physics degree preferred
 Must be able to start work on February 2013 or August 2013
 Technical support, pre-sales support, installation, or sales experience in the technology industry preferred
 Fluent in English, written and verbal
 Must be able to legally live and work India, without visa support or sponsorship (student visas or visas obtained on your own are not applicable for the program)
Relocation Requirements:
 Year 1: Associates must be willing to relocate to a CSAP training hub in Bangalore for the 12 months of the program. Cisco will provide relocation assistance.
 Year 2: Associates will be promoted to a Virtual Systems Engineering (VSE) role in TSN. VSEs must be willing to stay at the CSAP hub location or be relocated to a TSN hub within their home country for 12 months. Relocation outside CSAP hub location would be based on business need. We cannot confirm final placement destination at time of offer. Cisco will provide relocation assistance.
 Year 3: Employees can apply to open Systems Engineering positions within the company.
Why join Cisco? A career with Cisco Systems can offer you:
 The opportunity to work in one of the most successful sales organizations in the world
 Highly-competitive salary, accelerated career opportunities, and excellent benefits
 Virtual collaboration with classmates from around the world using TelePresence and WebEx
 Access to next-generation technologies
 Training, coaching, and mentoring by experienced Systems Engineers and Account Managers
 Ability to earn industry-leading certifications (CCNA, CCNP, CCDA, CCDP, and CCIE)
 Opportunity to work in a uniquely-diverse and socially-responsible environment
 The chance to work in multi-million dollar territories with high earning potential
 A significant investment by Cisco to your ongoing career development and success
Place of Posting : Bangalore, Chennai, Pune, Hyderabad

JOB PROFILE
Job Designation : Analyst
Job Description : As a part of IB Teams across various product groups, help in the IB activities and support desks across various locations such as NY, London, Singapore, HK, AUS, etc.

CIB Centre is Deutsche Banks investment banking center in India. CIB Centre works very closely with Deutsche Bank hubs to deliver cutting edge investment banking services for the Corporate & Investment Banking franchise of Deutsche Bank.

CIB Centre performs all major activities of an Investment bank including sales and coverage, origination, trading, structuring, business management and research. CIB Centre has teams working across GM products like Equities, Prime Finance, Rates, ICG, Fx, Credit trading, DCM, GM Research and Corporate Finance.

Typical activities Graduate would be involved as part of a CIB desk:

Analytics (Deal origination support, term sheet preparation, pitch books, research, macro analysis.

Structuring ( Scenario / Sensitivity analysis,, back-testing, volatility sensitivity etc., Indicative Pricing support using DB proprietary and external tools/pricing sheets, Supporting trade idea generation , Restructuring & trade unwind pricing support, Creating pricing templates and models using DB Analytics/GME analytics, Supporting the onshore team on NPA for launch of new products, Deal Execution support)

Trading Support ( Due diligence of business model and analysis of financial opportunities in private equity deals & Infrastructure Support, Building, calibrating and automating quantitative models for pricing, trading strategies and risk management purposes. Trade Analytics- scenario / sensitivity analysis, back-testing, volatility sensitivity etc. Bespoke analyses and analytical support for special initiatives. Develop financial models for use in evaluating potential investments Generate Alpha by recommending prop positions to the onshore team)

Sales Support ( Building, calibrating and automating quantitative models for sales teams, Identifying new market / product opportunities based on regular scanning of market / competitor landscape, Supporting trade idea generation)

Risk Modeling (Risk analysis to support trading desks and resolve risk issues, Modeling and analysis of complex or high-value positions, Testing Development & Validation of Products , Index calibration & Calculation of trade basket. Supporting the managing of risk on the books when to execute the trades / monitoring hedge exposures)

Typical Skill sets acquired by graduates working in CIB Centre:

Finance
- Advanced knowledge of Bonds and Swaps (Fixed Income Securities)
- Basic knowledge of market mechanism (settlements, coupon fixing etc) of Rates (Bonds, Swaps, XCY Swaps, Capfloors and Swaptions, short futures) , Equity Certificates, Commodity swaps and Interbank market
- Basic understanding of credit risk - CDS, iTraxx Indices on portfolio level
- Index construction and ETF hedging
- Portfolio Optimization - Markowitz, CVaR
- Basic understanding of Margining and Clearing
- Basic understanding of money market transactions

Quantitative Analysis
Advanced knowledge of Derivative Pricing
- Black Scholes, Levy model,
- Interest Rate models - Vasicek, BGM and Libor Market Model
- Vol Models - SABR, Heston, Dupire's Local Vol
- Monte Carlo - Quasi Monte Carlo, Variance reduction techniques
- Understanding of Greeks/Hedge parameters on portfolio level
- Backtesting and Performance analysis of strategies on derivatives
- Implementation or extensive user experience with rich pricing library (i.e. QuantLib)

Econometric Analysis
- Basic time series - PCA, Regressions, ARCH, GARCH, etc
- Factor Models - Advance interpolation techniques
- Relative Value analysis
- VaR, CVaR
- Distribution parameterization

Misc
- Multidimensional Optimization - BFGS, Levenberg Marquardt etc

Systems/Tools
Unix /Linux
- System calls, Semaphores, memory management, process management using signals ( fork, wait etc)

Database
- Efficient joins, indexing, normalization, query optimization, efficient schema design
- Experience in Oracle, DB2, MySQL or any popular relational database

Matlab
- Multidimensional Optimization, Econometric Analysis (PCA) ,Caching, Interfacing of Matlab with Java, C/C++, cgi,perl etc

Java
- SOA (Service Oriented Architecture), JMS (Java Messaging Queues), Web Services, MVC architecture
- Eclipse, Ant, Maven

Advanced JavaScript
- Experience Prototype, JQuery, Namespacing, Ajax

Brief Write-up on the Company (50-75 words) :
Dolat Capital is multi strategy investment Management Company and a financial advisory house, dedicated to producing superior returns adhering to mathematical methods. Dolat Capital is an analytical, team oriented firm that employs a dynamic & disciplined approach towards a variety of products and quantitative strategies for exploiting subtle anomalies in the market. As the financial industry continues to evolve at a rapid rate, we expect the future to present us with both great opportunities and challenges. Dolat Capital is dedicated to building and maintaining a world class team.
 
JOB PROFILE
Job Designation : Quantitative Researcher
Job Description : The Quantitative Research team at Dolat Capital focuses on quantitative trading, specifically fully automated trading strategies. We develop proprietary trading algorithms by using statistical analysis to identify patterns in the behavior of markets. Here's an opportunity for a creative problem solver to build mathematical trading models. This will be one of the first of its kind for the Indian markets. We are looking for bright, outstanding candidates who are interested in working in a stimulating and academic environment to implement quantitative trading models by adhering to mathematical and statistical methods in high systematic trading environment. Our core competency is mathematical modeling and computer science. We will build an array of analytical tools and a high performance trading infrastructure, to help us design, develop and run our quantitative strategies in global markets. We believe these systems are crucial to our success and provide a significant competitive advantage. You would be joining a group of best and brightest researchers from various scientific disciplines. Quantitative Research constantly pushes the frontiers of real market dynamics advancing our proprietary quantitative models and identifying new opportunities.

A researcher in the Quantitative Research division would be expected to use advanced Maths / Computer Science methods to find patterns in data that can be used to create low latency high frequency strategies. The candidate would be required to have a working knowledge of the most advanced learning and prediction algorithms, statistical models and prediction methods.

We are currently seeking extremely bright, articulate, highly-motivated candidates to join our team.
Candidates should feel comfortable in a really challenging machine learning + statistics + mathematics + programming environment.
Candidates should be comfortable with working under time pressure.
Candidates should hope to make a long-term commitment towards building a company.

Our requirements are the following:

Should be outstanding at Statistics/ Mathematics / Machine Learning / Data Analysis / Artificial Intelligence.
Highly qualified BTech, MTech, and PhD graduates from top programs in CS, EE, Math / Statistics and Physics Related work experience is helpful but not essential
Must be proficient in an object oriented programming language C++ in Unix / Linux environment
Interpersonal skills and ability to communicate effectively are essential

Experience in the financial industry is not a requirement but a strong affinity in finance and quantitative modeling is required, and we welcome candidates who have had no exposure to finance whatsoever.
Place of Posting : Mumbai

JOB PROFILE
Job Designation : ENO - Prime Services
Job Description : Prime Services is a business unit within the Securities Division. We provide traditional prime brokerage cover and value added services for our partner Hedge Fund Clients including; business consultancy, capital services (raising/structuring), financing, securities lending, clearance, custody, asset servicing. Our aim is to support the growth of our clients and deliver the full suite of products available across Credit Suisse. This team supports all three regions US/ Europe/ APAC and is quickly moving up the value chain in terms of quality and content of services offered.

Campus recruits will be hired under the Graduate program at an Analyst level by Prime Services division at Center of Excellence in Mumbai. All our graduate recruits will undergo an intensive training program consisting of classroom sessions by highly qualified instructors from New York. The classroom sessions will be collaborated with simulations and hands on practical experience with each team on the floor. The rotation in each team is aimed at developing holistic knowledge of the business and not just of a specific team. During this period one will also develop a global network of colleagues whom one can reach out for support. Support is given for any required regulatory training and exams. At the end of this rotation period an option is given to the candidates to profess which teams they wish to work with.

The responsibilities offered range from quantitative analytics, risk analysis, collateral management, stock borrowing/ lending, trade idea generation, structuring of index related products for Hedge fund clients, pricing / financing, client servicing to actual trade booking depending on the team chosen.

All team profiles require good analytical skills, an out of the box thinking and a continuous zeal on behalf of the candidates in increasing the efficiency and robustness of daily deliverables. All employees are encouraged to take up business development projects with global counterparts and put into use their rotation training to come with integrated projects, solutions and analytics that will help the business grow as a whole and not just a singular team. Employees work in global teams and hence should have good interpersonal skills.

Prior knowledge of financial products, market structure and financial services in addition to some technical skills relating to MS Excel, VBA will help.

Career growth from there on could be either on a specialist track focusing on content leadership or a managerial track focusing on people leadership. Extraordinary individuals on the specialist track could also transition to an expert consultant track and be eligible for election to a Partner in the Firm.
 
JOB PROFILE
Job Designation : Analyst
Job Description : Analyst
McKinsey & Company is a preeminent management consulting firm that helps leading companies and institutions make distinctive, lasting and substantial improvements to their performance. With over 9,000 consultants working in 99 offices in 54 countries, McKinsey advises organizations worldwide on issues of strategy, organization, operations and technology.

McKinsey & Company, Gurgaon Knowledge Center in India is the largest and most diverse knowledge hub of McKinsey. We offer an outstanding opportunity to professionals to join the Knowledge Network and work with consultants to deliver exceptional impact. It currently boasts more than 25 functional and industry practices representing a microcosm of McKinseyspecialized analytics and research teams with access to a global network of experts to draw insights and support consulting teams across all McKinsey offices.
McKC has been at the forefront of knowledge innovations at McKinsey. From delivering solutions such as rapid access research to specialized analytics and industry and functional Centers of Competence, our history is replete with examples of how innovation and entrepreneurship are at the heart of our operating culture.
OVERVIEW OF CENTER OF COMPETENCE
McKinseys Center of Competence (CoC) is a specialized client service capability designed to deliver specific parts of a client engagement. Our experts are members with deep domain expertise gained through their educational background and relevant industry experience, e.g., Manufacturing, Supply Chain, Risk, Marketing & Sales, etc. The CoCs are able to create distinctive impact across a range of services, including benchmarking, diagnostics, and modeling, as well as specialized support to client teams. Today there are more than 15 CoCs, staffed by nearly 200 members, across many of the core service lines of our functional practices.
OVERVIEW OF POSITION
McKinsey is looking for an Analyst for its Operations Center of Competence group. The Analyst would be expected to spend most of his/her time working with client service teams across the globe on Operations management topics in the area of Supply Chain management and Manufacturing. The Analyst would be located in Gurgaon, India. However, the Analyst might be required to travel in order to serve clients onsite depending on the need.
An Analyst moves to a Senior Analyst role taking on higher responsibilities (e.g. leading small teams on projects, leading client trainings etc). Career growth from Senior Analyst onwards could be either on a specialist track focusing on content leadership or a managerial track focusing on people leadership. Extraordinary individuals on the specialist track could also transition to an expert consultant track and be eligible for election to a Partner in the Firm.
RESPONSIBILITIES
The Analyst would spend significant part of his/her time working with the Operations practice and consulting teams in McKinsey helping with the complex client problems in the Supply Chain and Manufacturing domain. For example, developing optimal network configuration models for global supply chains of clients, simulating inventory levels with the objective of creating a sound inventory policy, running Manufacturing Excellence diagnostics at client sites to determine potential opportunities for transformation.
Additional time will be spent in doing general analytical work for the whole clientele of McKinsey, which would include usage of statistical techniques for data analysis and executing programming heavy work-modules, among others.
Specifically, he/she will be expected to perform the following roles:
Work on client engagements focusing on operations related analytical models
Support development and maintenance of proprietary McKinsey Operations Management tools and other knowledge development projects
KNOWLEDGE & SKILLS REQUIRED
We are looking for candidates who have demonstrated both a strong business sense and deep understanding of the quantitative foundations of risk management. Candidates must possess excellent problem solving skills, strong communication skills, team skills and entrepreneurial ability:
Excellent analytical and problem solving skills, including the ability to disaggregate issues, identify root causes and recommend solutions.
Good written and verbal communication skills. Fluent in both written and spoken English.
Energetic, cooperative and pleasant personality. Able to work with and coach effectively a diverse group of team members
Flexibility, patience, and an understanding of fluid, demanding, and unstructured environments where priorities evolve constantly and methodologies are regularly challenged.
Ability to work under pressure and deliver on tight deadlines
In addition to the above, successful execution of this role will also need high levels of technical expertise. Candidates should have exposure (and some degree of expertise) to some of the following tools and techniques:
Techniques like Linear, Nonlinear and Integer Programming, Discrete Event Simulation
Statistical techniques like Design of Experiments, Regression analysis
Tools like GAMS, OPL Studio, Arena
Programming skills in at least one of C, C++, VBA, MATLAB
Place of Posting : Gurgaon

Simply put, the possibilities are endless.

The Domain Edge.

While working with Wipro, employees also leverage the advantage of being involved through the entire cycle of Design, Implementation, Maintenance and Support. Working on an end-to-end delivery model also means that they get to interact with customers and multiple stakeholders. This gives them a more complete understanding of the industry, their work in particular and how it impacts businesses across the world. Taking on this level of responsibility and client interaction is also critical in helping them develop the mindset of managers and team leaders.



The Fast-track Advantage.

The Fast-track Development Program is so designed because we believe that potential coupled with mentorship can make a substantial difference in the way projects get executed, right from design to deployment. As an organization, we enable our employees to chart their careers by taking up roles of their choice through an open job posting & application policy and by giving their careers a strong foundation based on freedom and innovation. We also understand that for some people, taking up a structured management program may be the next level of aspiration and hence have this option available to candidates who meet the eligibility criteria.

Work at Wipro.

While on the program, candidates undergo a 24-month training schedule where they could get to work as the Project Enginee , a member of the Project Management Office , a Design Engineer, a Business Analyst or an Operations Manager . The training program provides them with an understanding of the Domain, the Technology, Project Management Fundamentals, Team Management and Customer Management.

Through the development and implementation of their project management skills, candidates at Wipro complete the training program in just a matter of two years thats half the amount of time an engineer would take normally. A series of assessments are employed to track their progress, which helps them understand more cohesively what they have learnt since they joined the team.

Eligibility Criteria.
This program is open for BE / BTECH Graduates & 5yrs dual engineering degree with a CGPA of 8.00 and above. Students passing out in 2012 across all streams are eligible to apply.

Eligibility Criteria.
This program is open for BE / BTECH Graduates & integrated courses MTech with a CGPA of 8.00 and above. Students passing out in 2012 across all streams are eligible to apply.

Brief Write-up on the Company (50-75 words) :
Broadcom Corporation is a leading fabless semiconductor company in the wireless and broadband communication business. The company is headquartered in Irvine, California, USA. Broadcom was founded by a professor-student pair Henry Samueli and Henry T. Nicholas III from the University of California, Los Angeles (UCLA) at Los Angeles, California in 1991. In 1995, the company moved from its Westwood, California, office to Irvine, California. In 1998, Broadcom became a public company on the NASDAQ exchange (ticker symbol: BRCM) and now employs approximately 9,450 people worldwide in more than 15 countries.
Broadcom Corporation is a prominent technology innovator and global leader in semiconductors for wired and wireless communications. Broadcom products enable the delivery of voice, video, data and multimedia to and throughout the home, the office and the mobile environment. We provide the industry's broadest portfolio of state-of-the-art system-on-a-chip and embedded software solutions to manufacturers of computing and networking equipment, digital entertainment and broadband access products, and mobile devices. These solutions support our core mission: Connecting everything.

Broadcom, one of the world's largest fabless communications semiconductor companies, with 2010 revenue of $6.82 billion, holds more than 5,350 U.S. and 2,300 foreign patents, and has more than 7,650 additional pending patent applications, and one of the broadest intellectual property portfolios addressing both wired and wireless transmission of voice, video, data and multimedia.

Broadcom, a FORTUNE 500 company, was recognized in FORTUNEs 2011 Worlds Most Admired Companies survey as the innovation leader in the semiconductor category. Broadcom is headquartered in Irvine, Calif., and has offices and research facilities in North America, Asia and Europe.
Broadcom is among Gartner's Top 10 Semiconductor Vendors by revenue. In 2010, Broadcom's total revenue was $6.82 billion.

GulfTalent.com is one of the largest online recruitment portals for the Middle East. It is used by over 3 million professionals and 5,000 companies across 9 countries.

JOB PROFILE
Job Designation : Business Analyst/Software Engineer
Job Description : Business Analyst Graduate Scheme


The Company

GulfTalent.com is one of the largest online recruitment portals for the Middle East. It is used by over 3 million professionals and 5,000 companies across 9 countries.

To support our continued growth, we are looking for smart and highly driven individuals with strong analytical skills and an entrepreneurial spirit to join our team.

The Role

As a Graduate Business Analyst you will conduct fact-based analysis and produce actionable insights to assist us in developing our strategies for improving our product, marketing, and operations. Your focus would be primarily on in-depth quantitative analysis, supported by consumer research, review of competitors as well as studies of overall market trends.

The position offers high visibility and frequent interactions with top management, the chance to solve complex business problems at the cutting edge of e-commerce as well as hands-on business building experience.

This is a challenging position which offers unlimited opportunities for personal development. You can expect comprehensive role-specific training as well as soft-skills development to make sure you are well prepared to succeed. Your manager will also be there to offer support and advice along the way.

A very competitive tax-free compensation package is offered, including participation in the companys profit sharing scheme. You will also receive special relocation assistance for moving to Dubai / London.

Requirements

We are looking for someone who has a genuine interest in problem solving and tackling challenging situations. The ideal candidate will have:

A degree from a top-tier university, preferably in a quantitative subject such as science, engineering or economics
Ability to work independently as well as in a team, and to handle multiple projects in a fast-paced environment
Intellectual curiosity and strategic thinking, together with a willingness to roll-up sleeves and execute the detail work
Excellent oral and written communication skills

*Place of Posting: Dubai / London

The Role

You will develop highly scalable software modules used by millions across the Middle East. You will be dealing with complex software problems and come up with new ideas to improve our product.

The role offers significant exposure to top management of the company as well as to commercial aspects of the business, and you will be able to see the impact of your work on users across an entire region of the world almost immediately.

JOB PROFILE
Job Designation : Trainee Sr. IT Engineer
Job Description : As part of CMC 3.0 Vision, CMC Limited is now looking to hire next generation technology leaders and innovators who are willing to make a difference and deliver sustainable value to marketplace.

Member of Technical Staff, Product Development

You would join as member of technical staff in product engineering team and evolve to pursue product management or technology roles within Product Groups with an option to focus on specific research and development activities relevant to the product lines.

You should have
 Passion for high quality programming
 Appetite to learn and master new programming paradigms and an ability to be a polyglot.
 Natural tendency for innovation
 Ability to blend machines and software
 Strong Algorithmic background for solving business problems in Transportation, Logistics, Insurance, Financial Markets, Mining, Telematics
 Understanding of Platforms, APIs, Cloud and SaaS
 Hold your own when working with top notch people.
 Ability to pick up product design and architecture patterns and build next generation product architectures



Member of Technical Staff, Technology Center of Excellences

Each of the COEs enable the interested with required technical expertise to build a sustainable and strong careers in the associated domains and an opportunity to work with some of the finest Enterprise Architects in the organization.

Big Data and Analytics COE
As Member of Technical Staff, you can expect:
 To build a very strong foundation on data and information processing techniques, associated challenges and explore options for optimal resolution along with being abreast with a continuously changing technology landscape
 To embrace and leverage free and open source software (FOSS) to build the finest advanced analytics solutions for the marketplace
 To be part of the core development team engaged in building the CMC 3.0 Big Data and Advanced Analytics Vision and associated Technology Platform
 To specialize in the areas of evolving and applying some of the most Advanced Data Mining techniques on large data and information sets across a variety of business domains that include Financial Services, Healthcare, Security, Transportation among others
 Be part of teams that are solving some of the finest and complex business problems through the world of predictive analytics, semantic inferencing and reasoning techniques
 Be part of teams that are focused on developing next generation event driven architectures for some of the large products being built at CMC enabling fast and real-time analytics

You are expected to:
 Have a strong appetite for Mathematics and Logic
 Strong foundation in the world of Java/C++ programming languages combined with a fair understanding of distributed computing and parallel programming practices
 Enjoy the world of complex algorithms and operations research problems
 Be curious and explore each potential problem as an opportunity to learn and innovate
 Have a passion for both the art and science of programming
 Appetite to be perseverant and focused to achieve the agreed team objectives to deliver to the market

Mobility COE
As Member of Technical Staff, you can expect:
 To build a career in Mobility domain by laying a strong foundation in Mobile application design and development space
 To create Mobile Applications across various leading Mobile Platforms (iOS, Android, Microsoft)
 To learn Mobile Cross Platform Frameworks
 Work on Product development targeting CMC 3.0 focus areas
 Develop new Mobile Applications (CMC Assets) and deploy them on Global App Stores
 Applicability of Mobile technologies into different domains (Consumer Electronics, Industrial Automation, Telecom, Automotive, Banking & Finance, Retail etc.) as Enterprise Mobility Solutions

You are expected to:
 Have a good academic knowledge in Java/C++, JavaScript, CSS, HTML5.0, XML technologies.
 Have a good understanding Web Application and RIA frameworks
 Strong attitude and aptitude to learn, focus on User Experience, Man-Machine interaction models

Next Generation Infrastructure Services CoE
As Member of Technical Staff, you can expect:
 To work on current /future technologies in the Infrastructure services space including Virtualization, Cloud and XaaS opportunities
 Get exposed to the space of Project management
 Learn not only the technologies, but also the processes and management involved in Infrastructure Services
 Learn the importance of standardization, automation in the world of large scale infrastructure setup, deployment and management services
 Move on to areas of interest and work and develop devops for the same
 Grow / learn not only in Vendor technology stacks but also in end user / client organizations

You are expected to:
 Be willing and have a positive attitude to learn
 Have a basic knowledge of the associated technologies (Operating Systems, Distributed Computing)
 Have strong programming skills to work on scripting/automation (Unix, Linux or Windows)

JOB PROFILE
Job Designation : Software Engineer
Job Description : : Job Designation : Software Engineer
Level : Entry

Are you are interested in making a huge difference to social communications and building the largest community on mobile at one of India?s hottest companies? Do you believe that insanely great products can be built by small teams? Can you churn out the solution even without clear requirements, by anticipating what the user needs? Dying to write code that is used by tens of millions of people daily? Cannot wait to get up and go to ?work? each morning? Want to work with extremely smart people day in and day out?

If so, you may qualify to apply to GupShup. We are extremely selective on who we admit, and the interview process has been known to reduce people to tears, but once you?re in, it?s the experience of a lifetime.

Skills

? For server developers, you are a crack coder in Java (or other environment like PHP/RoR but comfortable migrating to Java). You are experienced handling MySQL storage and understand high availability and scalability concepts like sharding, load balancing, replication, hot failover etc. You are comfortable moving on to newer infrastructure ? in particular MongoDB, Hadoop, Hive and node.js. You understand how to architect your system around well defined stable APIs. AWS related experience a definite plus.
? For mobile application developers, you have a track record of building apps for at least one of Android, iOS, Blackberry, S40, Symbian, Bada or Windows Phone. You known how to use SQLLite effectively and building apps for low battery, bandwidth and memory consumption is second nature for you. You know how to architect for unreliable network while maintaining awesome user experience.
? For Web and Hybrid mobile app developers, you understand HTML5, CSS, JavaScript. Knowledge of Phonegap, JQuery, YUI a plus.

Attitude
? You come in with deep knowledge of certain areas in software (you will need to impress us and teach us something in your interview), and a desire and ability to learn new things fast.
? You communicate pro-actively and have a positive approach to difficult problems. You can solve a problem multiple times, quick and dirty to start and then refined to be elegant and future proof. .
? You thrive in a low management, pod-like, cross functional environment and are used to delighting your peers and managers by performing way beyond expectations. You are comfortable with ambiguity, late nights, and high wire acrobatic programming under pressure filled deadlines ? in fact you like all of these, since you are a self driven individual.
? You do not need the ?requirements? to be 100% clear in order to produce. At the same time, you are not a lone wolf, you thrive in a team collaborative environment.

JOB PROFILE
Job Designation : Associate Software Developer
Job Description : The Client Support and Development team is responsible for integrating FlexTrade software products with those of its clients and supporting the implemented solutions on an ongoing basis. These groups also interact very closely with traders and develop trading strategies for them. The team members also act as account managers for the accounts they work with. This position gives the candidates a unique opportunity to develop both technical and business skills in the Finance Industry. The position also offers substantial exposure to the trading industry and to the complete trading cycle. The ideal candidate would be able to work on multiple projects and manage his/her time accordingly.


Responsibilities:

Develop and implement solutions for integrating FlexTrade products with those of the clients. This usually involves software development in C++ / Java / Perl / Databases etc.

Support the FlexTrade products at the client sites on an ongoing basis. This requires the team members to learn the trading functionality and the backend functionality as well.

Constantly build tools and scripts to automate the installation and trouble shooting of the system.

Write custom trading strategies for clients.

Manage the client accounts and work as relationship managers for the accounts allocated.

Come up with New Product/Enhancement Ideas based on the experience with the clients and assist in the development and refinement of product and software requirements.

Take ownership of specific modules within the system and work on fixing bugs and making enhancements in those modules, thus contributing to the product release process.

Verify product user manuals, on-line documentation and help systems for correctness

IBM innovations are a major differentiator in providing solutions for the companys clients through its services businesses. IBM has been patent leader for 19th consecutive year - IBMs 6,180 patents in 2011 were the most U.S. patents ever awarded to one company in a single year.

STG Software Group builds a range of general purpose and integrated systems designed and optimized for specific business, public and scientific computing needs. These systemsSystem z, Power Systems and System xare typically the core technology in data centers that provide required infrastructure for business and institutions. Also, these systems form the foundation for IBMs integrated offerings, such as IBM Smart Analytics, IBM Netezza, IBM SmartCloud Entry and IBM BladeCenter for Cloud

STG Hardware group builds a range of general purpose and integrated systems designed and optimized for specific business, public and scientific computing needs. This group focuses mainly on development of critical semiconductor chips which go into IBM mainframe, power systems, OEM products along with developing cutting edge EDA tools, manufacturing technology & performance validation activities which help in differentiating IBM products over competitors.

STG Storage Group allows clients to retain and manage rapidly growing, complex volumes of digital information. These solutions address critical client requirements for information retention and archiving, security, compliance and storage optimization including data de-duplication, availability and virtualization. The portfolio consists of a broad range of disk and tape storage systems and software, including the ultra-scalable disk storage system XIV.
